price: Wͻpene so sε wͻka (mmaa ne) wͻn a wͻkaa akyire (wͻ fie) no ho. Yɛatua wͻn akoma ano enti wͻnte asεm ase.
arabic: رَضُواْ بِأَن يَكُونُواْ مَعَ ٱلۡخَوَالِفِ وَطُبِعَ عَلَىٰ قُلُوبِهِمۡ فَهُمۡ لَا يَفۡقَهُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: raḍū bi-an yakūnū maʿa al-khawālifi waṭubiʿa ʿalā qulūbihim fahum lā yafqahūna
